Reviews.Title: Fantabulous ! !
Reviews.Author: saranya
Reviews.Content: Awesome Picture quality ! ! and accessories are too good.Complete photographer's package.But, Price is too high and can be little less.

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA FOR THE PRICE!!!1
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: I have owned a T3I Canon and the quality can not stand up to the smaller and better D3200 I HAVE USED TO CAMERA FOR 2 DAYS NOW VS MY CANON AND IT WILL EACH ROUND!!!!!
